Policies and Initiatives.title: Telangana govt signs pact with Deakin University to establish AI CoE
Policies and Initiatives.summary: The Telangana government has signed a pact with Deakin University to establish an Artificial Intelligence Centre of Excellence (AI CoE). This partnership aims to boost research and advanced skill development in key sectors. The new CoE is expected to contribute to Telangana's emergence as a gateway for Digital India.

Events.title: IIIT-Hyderabad uses AI to decode the Indian thali
Events.summary: Researchers at IIIT-Hyderabad are developing an AI-powered system to analyze the Indian thali, a meal with diverse textures and overlapping ingredients. The system aims to decode the complex composition of the thali using artificial intelligence. The research was presented at the 16th Indian Conference on Computer Vision, Graphics and Image Processing 2025.

Major AI Developments.title: Google rolls out AI-powered photo editing feature in India
Major AI Developments.summary: Google has launched an AI-powered photo editing feature in India, allowing users to edit images in Google Photos using voice or text prompts. The feature, powered by Gemini, supports multiple Indian languages and offers conversational editing tools. It also provides personalised editing options for users.

AI Start-Up News.title: Sarvam AI signs MoU with TN Govt to set up  sovereign AI park with ₹10,000 cr investment
AI Start-Up News.summary: Sarvam AI has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with the Tamil Nadu government to establish a sovereign AI park. The project is expected to attract an investment of ₹10,000 crore. The AI park aims to promote innovation and development in the field of artificial intelligence.

AI Start-Up News.title: T-Hub selects 10 startups to drive AI, semiconductor innovation in India
AI Start-Up News.summary: T-Hub has selected 10 startups in partnership with the UK Government's 'UK-India Emerging Tech Exchange Programme' to drive innovation in AI and semiconductors. The chosen startups include Alice Camera, B-Secur, and StarBuzz.AI, among others. The partnership aims to leverage the capabilities of both India and the UK in these disciplines to foster growth and collaboration.

AI Start-Up News.title: T-Hub and Hexagon selects 12 Startups for LAB32 Cohort, Driving Innovation in AI and Digital Reality
AI Start-Up News.summary: T-Hub and Hexagon have selected 12 startups for the LAB32 cohort, a 100-day program focused on innovation in AI and digital reality. The program will provide mentorship, support, and market access opportunities to the selected startups, with three potentially partnering with Hexagon. The startups were chosen from over 230 applications through a rigorous evaluation process.
